introduction: 成群的动物可以显示出令人难以想象的力量。它们可以破坏食物和能源的供应，使交通系统陷于瘫痪，利用现代摄影艺术。超级群体显示出了动物之间进攻背后的群体的智慧，以及人类如何应对的。When animals swarm they create a super-organism of incredible power. They can attack our food supplies, immobilise our transport systems, undermine our cities and even attack our energy supplies. They can stop us in our tracks. Using state-of-the-art photography, Superswarms reveals the collective intelligence behind the animal invasions, and how man fights back.
